mapper.insert: insert into foods(foodsid , foodsname , image , cateid , price , recommend , addtime , hits , sellnum , contents ) values(#{foodsid} , #{foodsname} , #{image} , #{cateid} , #{price} , #{recommend} , #{addtime} , #{hits} , #{sellnum} , #{contents} )
mapper.update: update foods set foodsname=#{foodsname} , image=#{image} , cateid=#{cateid} , price=#{price} , recommend=#{recommend} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} , sellnum=#{sellnum} , contents=#{contents} where foodsid=#{foodsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.catename from foods a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by foodsid desc
select a.* , b.catename from foods a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by Foodsid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from foods a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by sellnum desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from foods a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid and a.cateid=#{cateid} order by sellnum desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from foods a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid and foodsid=#{foodsid} order by foodsid desc
